A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Rian Johnson gave a shit sandwich with this stinker of a movie.  So disappointed.  I wanted to see some background on characters that TFA gave us...who was Snoke?  What is Rey's parentage?  etc...instead we follow Rose Rose Binks around and hear her lecture us on animal rights and class warfare.  No thanks.\n\nNot a bot or a fanboy\, just an annoyed lifelong fan who isn't impressed with these new characters and direction this movie gave us.  Save your SJW issues for the voting booth.
